title: Windows 8.1 Pro X86 3in1 ESD en-US Sep 2014
description:
Windows 8.1 Pro x86 3in1 ESD en-US Sep 2014  


[ RELEASE INFO ]

  File:		Win8.1.x86.en-US.Sep2014.iso

  Language:     en-US (English - USA)

  Sources:	dvd_4065105
		dvd_4065185
		
		
  Size: 	3,54GB
  Format: 	Bootable ISO
   
  CRC32: 	a492d310
  MD5:		df11a4933347e2f983e2891e113ba11d
  SHA-1: 	07551ed3f487beddf76a9cc3d4922d5ddc17cd9c

   
[ CONTENTS ]

  Integrated / Pre-installed in Audit Mode:

  * .Net Framework 3.5
  * .Net Framework 4.5.2 (KB2977302)
  * Internet Explorer 11
  * Hotfixes - 2014-09-09

  Setupcomplete / Post-install:

  * DirectX Juni 2010
  * KB890930
  * Defender Updates


[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

  * Windows 8.1 	                                    
  * Windows 8.1 Pro                              
  * Windows 8.1 Enterprise 

  
[ FEATURES ]
  
  * install.wim compressed to recovery format (install.esd)
  * Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8.1 (Microsoft DaRT)
    

[ COMMENTS & ACTIVATION INFO ]

  * Only clean installs can be made with this format, not upgrades.

  * A WPI-window will pop up in the last phase of the installation.
  * To Pre-Activate Windows, select "KMSPico" and "Begin Install".
  * To skip activation, just click on "Exit".   
  
  Activator:

  * KMSpico v9.2.3.0 

    
[ INSTALLATION ]

  * Create bootable USB (highly recommended), minimum 8GB, with Rufus (attached) 
    or, if you really must; burn to DVD at slow speed.
 

  Hope you will enjoy this release!

  Regards,
  Generation2
